entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing drizzle or drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to a few rain showers near midnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
